verses.name: 1 Kings 14:29
verses.text: Now the rest of the acts of Rehoboam, and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?

verses.name: 1 Kings 14:30
verses.text: And there was war between Rehoboam and Jeroboam all their days.

verses.name: 1 Kings 14:31
verses.text: And Rehoboam slept with his fathers, and was buried with his fathers in the city of David. And his mother’s name was Naamah an Ammonitess. And Abijam his son reigned in his stead.
